meanings.definition: A person or thing that depicts.
meanings.sent1: The talented artist was one of the best depictors in the gallery.
meanings.sent2: The depictors in the painting beautifully captured the essence of the scene.
meanings.sent3: The depictors at the art show were so skilled, they made the paintings come to life.
meanings.sent4: The depictors on the stage painted a vivid picture of the historical event.
meanings.sent5: The depictors' work left a lasting impression on all who viewed it.

meanings.definition: A group of people or things that depict.
meanings.sent1: The team of depictors worked together to create a stunning mural.
meanings.sent2: The depictors in the movie industry play a crucial role in storytelling.
meanings.sent3: The depictors in the play were so synchronized, it was like watching a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent4: The depictors of nature in the documentary brought the beauty of the world to the audience.
meanings.sent5: The depictors' collaboration resulted in a masterpiece that amazed everyone.
